I think that ideally, every human being would be able to have great healthcare coverage. However, coming from a family that exploited the benefits of the 2013 Affordable Healthcare Act, I feel as though there has not been a way in which UHC has been implemented to where it will not cause many families, like mine, to handicap themselves and to remain unemployed. I completely believe that UHC is the best option morally, but in reality I feel that there has not been a way to where it will work to better America or a lot of its people in the way it sounds that it would.
